mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GT_A004_A ( MGRNU, HOL, CTK_MGRNU, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, GU_NAM, DONG_NAM, SCH_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, XGEO, EVE, CRS_TYPE, SL_YN, ESB_CPY, ESB_YMD, VEL, DRN_NUM, ROD_NAM, ROD_MGRNU, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( GET_MGRNU('GT_A004_A'), #{leng}, NULL, #{cssNam}, #{peNam}, #{guNam}, #{dongNam}, #{schNam}, #{minX}, #{minY}, #{maxX}, #{maxY}, #{xce}, #{yce}, #{peCde}, #{guCde}, #{dongCde}, #{cssMgrnu}, #{schMgrnu}, #{liNam}, #{liCde}, #{jibun}, #{pnu}, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181), #{eve}, #{crsType}, #{slYn}, #{esbCpy}, #{esbYmd}, #{leng}, #{drnNum}, #{rodNam}, #{rodMgrnu}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT B.SIG_KOR_NM , b.SIG_CD , A.EMD_KOR_NM, a.EMD_CD , C.LI_KOR_NM, c.LI_CD , D.JIBUN, d.PNU FROM GT_LP_AA_EMD A, GT_LP_AA_SGG B, GT_LP_AA_RI C, GT_LP_PA_CBND D WHERE SUBSTR(D.PNU, 0, 5) = B.SIG_CD AND SUBSTR(D.PNU, 0, 8) = A.EMD_CD AND SUBSTR(D.PNU, 0, 10) = C.LI_CD(+) AND MDSYS.SDO_RELATE( D.XGEO, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), 'MASK=ANYINTERACT') = 'TRUE' AND ROWNUM = 1
select css_nam, mgrnu from gt_a008_a where MDSYS.SDO_RELATE( XGEO, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), 'MASK=ANYINTERACT') = 'TRUE' AND ROWNUM = 1
select sch_nam, sch_mgrnu from gt_c101_a where MDSYS.SDO_RELATE( XGEO, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), 'MASK=ANYINTERACT') = 'TRUE' AND ROWNUM = 1
select pe_nam, pe_cde from gt_police where MDSYS.SDO_RELATE( XGEO, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), 'MASK=ANYINTERACT') = 'TRUE' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT MGRNU, ROAD_NAM FROM GT_C087_L WHERE sdo_nn(xgeo, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(2001,5181,SDO_POINT_TYPE(#{xce},#{yce},NULL),NULL,NULL),'sdo_num_res=1 distance=20 unit=m', 1) = 'TRUE'

SELECT MGRNU, '청주시' ||' '|| GU_NAM || ' ' || DONG_NAM || ' ' || RI_NAM || JIBUN AS ADDR, HOL, CTK_MGRNU, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, SCH_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, RI_CDE, PNU, XGEO, EVE, TO_CODE('ALL','EVE',EVE) AS EVE_NAM, CRS_TYPE, TO_CODE('A004_A','CRS_TYPE',CRS_TYPE) AS CRS_TYPE_NAM, SL_YN, TO_CODE('A004_A','SL_YN',SL_YN) AS SL_YN_NAM, ESB_CPY, TO_CHAR(ESB_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESB_YMD, VEL, DRN_NUM, ROD_NAM, ROD_MGRNU, REG_YMD, UPT_YMD FROM GT_A004_A WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.update: UPDATE GT_A004_A SET EVE = #{eve}, ESB_YMD = #{esbYmd}, ESB_CPY = #{esbCpy}, CRS_TYPE = #{crsType}, HOL = #{hol}, SL_YN = #{slYn}, AREA = #{area}, UPT_YMD = SYSDATE, CTK_MGRNU = null, CSS_NAM = #{cssNam}, PE_NAM = #{peNam}, GU_NAM = #{guNam}, DONG_NAM = #{dongNam}, SCH_NAM = #{schNam}, PE_CDE = #{peCde}, GU_CDE = #{guCde}, DONG_CDE = #{dongCde}, CSS_MGRNU = #{cssMgrnu}, SCH_MGRNU = #{schMgrnu}, RI_NAM = #{liNam}, RI_CDE = #{liCde}, JIBUN = #{jibun}, PNU = #{pnu}, ROD_NAM = #{rodNam}, ROD_MGRNU = #{rodMgrnu}, XCE = #{pointXce}, YCE = #{pointYce}, MAXX = #{maxX}, MAXY = #{maxY}, MINX = #{minX}, MINY = #{minY}, XGEO = MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181) WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_A004_A_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}

INSERT INTO GT_A004_A_WORK ( GEOMSEQ, MGRNU, HOL, CTK_MGRNU, CSS_NAM, DONG_NAM, GU_NAM, PE_CDE, ROD_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, AREA, XCE, YCE, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, PE_NAM, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, SCH_NAM, ROD_NAM, ESB_YMD, VEL, DRN_NUM, EVE, CRS_TYPE, SL_YN, ESB_CPY, XGEO, MGRNU_IDX, WORKUSER, WORKTM, WORK_CDE, WORK_BG, WORK_REG_YMD, WORK_OP, WORK_ACTIVE, CHK_CITY) SELECT GEOMSEQ, MGRNU, HOL, CTK_MGRNU, CSS_NAM, DONG_NAM, GU_NAM, PE_CDE, ROD_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, AREA, XCE, YCE, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, PE_NAM, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, SCH_NAM, ROD_NAM, ESB_YMD, VEL, DRN_NUM, EVE, CRS_TYPE, SL_YN, ESB_CPY, XGEO, #{mgrnuIdx}, #{workuser}, #{worktm}, #{workCde}, #{workBg}, #{workRegYmd}, #{workRegOp}, 1, #{chkCity} FROM GT_A004_A WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORKUSER, WORKTM, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORK_BG, WORK_REG_YMD, WORK_OP, WORK_ACTIVE, CHK_CITY FROM GT_A004_A_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 AND MGRNU_IDX = #{mgrnuIdx}
